name: Monster Truck Soccer
description:
Your craziest Monster Truck driving experience ever!

- Score as many goals as you can driving your Monster Truck.
- Play against a smart AI opponent or play against your friend in local WiFi multiplayer mode.
- Tune your truck's parameters to gain advantage.
- Enjoy the real driving experience.
- You can also use a Game Controller.
- Will you be the Top Scorer on the Game Center leaderboard?
